content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Coal mine at position(x=43.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=43.0, y=-82.0) with fuel inventory
-  Burner inserter (position x=43.5, y=-80.5) that picks up items from the drill
-  Three wooden chests (positions x=45.5, y=-80.5; x=44.5, y=-81.5; x=43.5, y=-79.5) that store items

### Furnace at position(x=41.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of a furnace (position x=41.0, y=-82.0) with fuel inventory

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when inserting items into furnace
-  Ensure you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into the furnace
### Errors when drill output is blocked
-  Ensure there is a sink entity in place to accept the output from the drill
### Errors when using inserter
-  Ensure the inserter has a valid pickup and drop position
-  Ensure the inserter has enough fuel to operate
### Errors when placing entities
-  Ensure the tile is not occupied by another entity before attempting to place a new entity
### Errors when extracting resources
-  Ensure you have a valid drill or mining equipment to extract the resources
-  Ensure you have enough fuel to power the drill or mining equipment
